alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 7:56PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Atlantic and northeastern Cape May Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 756 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beesleys Point, or over Ocean City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atlantic City, Ocean City, Pleasantville, Somers Point, Ventnor City, Brigantine, Northfield, Absecon, Margate City, Estell Manor, Port Republic, Longport, Corbin City, Pomona, Beesleys Point, English Creek, Marmora, Strathmere and Linwood. This includes the following highways... Garden State Parkway between mile markers 21 and 48. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 0 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic
